archetype.title: You are like David Beckham during his prime
archetype.desc: Much like David Beckham, you embody a blend of charisma and determination. Your commitment to self-care and proactive health choices mirrors Beckham's dedication to fitness and style. While you face challenges in emotional health and social connections, your strengths in engaging activities and overcoming past habits reflect a journey of resilience. Just as Beckham transformed his image and career through hard work and passion, you too have the potential to enhance your well-being and social ties, paving the way for a vibrant future.

transformation.headline: See Your Potential Transformation
transformation.messageQuote: Hey, it's me—30 days from now. I remember feeling uncertain, just like you do now. But trust me, the journey ahead is incredible. You'll find joy in small wins—like when you first notice your skin glowing or feel more energy. You'll push through and feel so proud. I'm you, just a version that's embraced change. We're closer than you think!

q1.text: How would you rate your overall energy levels throughout the day?
q1.option2: Good energy with minor afternoon dips
q1.option3: Moderate energy, noticeable ups and downs

q2.text: How many hours of quality sleep do you typically get per night?
q2.option5: Less than 4 hours or severely disrupted

q3.text: How often do you engage in physical activity that makes you breathe harder or sweat?
q3.option4: Once per week or less (30-60 min/week)

q4.text: Which best describes your typical daily nutrition pattern?
q4.option1: Whole foods, vegetables, lean proteins, minimal processing
q4.option2: Mostly healthy with occasional processed foods
q4.option3: Mixed diet, some healthy and some processed foods
q4.option5: Predominantly fast food and ultra-processed foods

q5.text: What is your relationship with tobacco products?

q6.text: How effectively do you manage stress in your daily life?
q6.option1: I have excellent stress management strategies and rarely feel overwhelmed
q6.option2: I manage stress well most of the time
q6.option3: I manage stress adequately but sometimes feel overwhelmed
q6.option4: I struggle with stress management and often feel overwhelmed
q6.option5: I feel chronically stressed and have poor coping mechanisms

q7.text: How would you rate your overall emotional well-being?
q7.option1: Consistently positive, resilient, and emotionally stable
q7.option2: Generally positive with good emotional regulation
q7.option3: Balanced but with some emotional ups and downs
q7.option4: Often struggle with negative emotions or mood swings
q7.option5: Frequently experience anxiety, depression, or emotional instability

q8.text: How satisfied are you with your social connections and support system?
q8.option1: I have strong, meaningful relationships and excellent social support
q8.option2: I have good relationships and adequate social support
q8.option3: I have some relationships but wish for deeper connections
q8.option4: I have limited social connections and support
q8.option5: I feel socially isolated and lack meaningful connections

q9.text: How often do you engage in activities that bring you joy and fulfillment?
q9.option1: Daily - I regularly engage in meaningful, enjoyable activities
q9.option3: Weekly - I make time for enjoyable activities
q9.option4: Occasionally - I sometimes make time for enjoyable activities
q9.option5: Rarely - I feel disconnected from activities I enjoy

q10.text: How do you feel about your physical appearance and body image?
q10.option1: Very confident and satisfied with my appearance
q10.option3: Neutral feelings, some areas of concern

q11.text: How would you rate your skin health and appearance?
q11.option2: Good - generally healthy with minor concerns
q11.option3: Average - some skin concerns but manageable
q11.option4: Poor - frequent skin issues or concerns
q11.option5: Very poor - significant ongoing skin problems

q12.text: How often do you experience physical symptoms like headaches, digestive issues, muscle tension, or frequent colds?
q12.option1: Rarely or never - I feel physically well
q12.option2: Occasionally - minor issues that don't impact daily life
q12.option4: Frequently - symptoms that affect my daily activities
q12.option5: Constantly - chronic symptoms that significantly impact my life

q13.text: How would you describe your alcohol consumption pattern?

q14.text: What is your current Body Mass Index (BMI) category?

q18.text: How much water do you typically drink per day?

q17.text: In which country do you currently live?
